entry.title: GameStop’s Ethereum NFT Sales Dwarf Coinbase NFT in Two Days
entry.summary: The two-day-old platform, still in beta, moved well over 3,000 ETH. That's minuscule compared to OpenSea, but it beats Coinbase NFT.

entry.title: Troubled Crypto Lending Platform Celsius Files For Bankruptcy
entry.summary: With $167 million left in cash, the embattled exchange has finally turned Chapter 11 rumors into reality.

entry.title: Polygon Among Six Web3 Projects Selected for Disney Accelerator
entry.summary: This year's program focuses on augmented and virtual reality and building the metaverse.

entry.title: Ethereum Mining Pools Will Survive The Merge—What About the Miners?
entry.summary: As Ethereum prepares to move from proof-of-work mining to proof of stake, thousands of ETH miners may be left stranded.

entry.title: Celsius Pays Off Last DeFi Loan in Push to Recoup $1 Billion
entry.summary: The repayment to Compound netted Celsius almost $200 million in collateral.

entry.title: Algorand’s Formula E NFTs Are Tackling Climate Change Head-On
entry.summary: The ‘greenest blockchain’ has launched a series of Formula E racing helmet NFTs in partnership with Envision Racing.

entry.title: UN Says Developing Nations Should Ban Bitcoin Ads, Regulate Crypto Wallets
entry.summary: The UN believes crypto could threaten the monetary sovereignty of developing nations, and it's recommending strict rules to curtail their use.

entry.title: SEC Delays Decision on Cathie Wood’s ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: The regulatory body will now give an answer to the ETF application on August 30.

entry.title: Deep in Crypto Winter, a CryptoPunks Ethereum NFT Sells for $2.6M
entry.summary: The 2,500 ETH sale price matches other CryptoPunk apes, albeit at a much lower USD valuation given diminished crypto prices.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Falter as June Inflation Report Is Worse Than Expected
entry.summary: The report signaled that the Federal Reserve will have to maintain its aggressive monetary stance to combat inflation.

entry.title: What Are The Different Types of Bitcoin Nodes? How the Bitcoin Network is Maintained
entry.summary: The underlying infrastructure of the Bitcoin network is secured and maintained by nodes—find out what they are, and how they work.

entry.title: Ethereum Scaling Solution StarkNet Announces Token Launch for September
entry.summary: StarkWare today announced the launch of a native token for its layer-2 scaling solution called StarkNet.

entry.title: NFL Expands Ticket Stub NFTs to Over 100 Games for 2022 Season
entry.summary: The league will offer free Flow-based collectibles for nearly five times as many regular season games as its NFT ambitions grow.

entry.title: Crypto Lender Celsius Is 'Deeply Insolvent’, Says Vermont’s Financial Regulator
entry.summary: The Vermont Department of Financial Regulation also indicated that “until recently, Celsius was operating without regulatory oversight.”

entry.title: 'Crypto Is an Investment in Nothing': Charlie Munger
entry.summary: Charlie Munger's continued dismay in Bitcoin sees no end as the billionaire recently told investors to “never touch it. Never buy it.”

entry.title: U.S. Treasury Wants Your Comments on Biden's Crypto Order
entry.summary: The Biden Administration has officially invited public input into future U.S. policies towards digital assets.

entry.title: Bored Ape 'Troll' Sued by Yuga Hires Pepe the Frog Creator’s Attorney
entry.summary: “We’re perfectly happy to let this go to trial,” the lawyer told Decrypt.

entry.title: Yes, Hostess Really Made Crypto-Themed Twinkies Called $TWINKcoin
entry.summary: It’s no joke: They’re now available in the United States.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Vitalik Buterin Claps Back at Bitcoin Maxis Who Mock Proof of Stake
entry.summary: Proof of stake has its critics, and Vitalik Buterin has some "spicy" answers for them.

entry.title: Bank of England Governor on Crypto Regulation: 'People Don’t Fly for Long on Unsafe Airplanes'
entry.summary: The U.K.'s central bank continues to urge for tougher cryptocurrency regulations.

entry.title: Lightspeed Adds $7 Billion Across Four Funds, Creates ‘Crypto-Native’ Team
entry.summary: The raise comes as quarter-on-quarter venture funding fell sharply in a bear market that’s overwhelmed several companies.

entry.title: ‘Move-to-Earn’ Game Stepn Renews Token Burn Amid Ethereum Expansion
entry.summary: Stepn intends to spend over $6 million of Q2 profits to buy back and burn GMT tokens, plus the game added Ethereum support.

entry.title: Three Arrows Capital Liquidators Cleared by Judge to Issue Subpoenas
entry.summary: In April, the crypto hedge fund had assets under management totaling $3 billion. In July, the company filed for bankruptcy.

entry.title: Celsius Recovers Over $400M in Staked Ethereum Collateral From Aave Loan
entry.summary: The move brings the embattled lending platform’s total debt across DeFi protocols down to just $59 million.

entry.title: Gnosis Rebrands as Safe, Raises $100M To Build Multi-Wallet Ecosystem
entry.summary: The company behind popular crypto wallet Gnosis is now building an adaptable, multi-app ecosystem for the custody of digital assets.

entry.title: Solana NFT Marketplace Magic Eden Launches Gaming Venture Arm
entry.summary: The leading Solana NFT marketplace doubles down on Web3 gaming with Magic Ventures plus the launch of in-game storefronts.

entry.title: Three Arrows Capital Says Cooperation With Liquidators Met With 'Baiting'
entry.summary: Legal counsel of the embattled crypto fund 3AC said the firm’s founders and their families received “threats of physical violence.”

entry.title: Multicoin Capital Announces New $430M Venture Fund
entry.summary: Crypto investment firm Multicoin Capital today announced its latest fund, Venture Fund III, with commitments of up to $430 million.

entry.title: NFT Game Publisher Animoca Raises $75M—At Higher Valuation Than Before Crypto Crash
entry.summary: Animoca Brands just landed fresh funding to the tune of $75 million as the broader crypto market continues to hemorrhage in value.

entry.title: Hackers Nab $8M in Ethereum via Uniswap Phishing Attack
entry.summary: After gaining access to Uniswap LPs via a malicious airdrop contract, hackers stole more than 7,500 in Ethereum.

entry.title: More Than 62,000 Crypto Traders Liquidated as Bitcoin, Ethereum Take Tumble
entry.summary: Leading cryptocurrencies Bitcoin and Ethereum dropped several points this morning, with BTC falling below $20,000 and Ethereum edging towards $1,000.

entry.title: Axie Infinity NFT Sales Rising Amid 'Play-and-Earn' Transition
entry.summary: After economic collapse and the massive Ronin bridge hack, crypto’s biggest game is showing fresh signs of life. Will it last?

entry.title: Texas Bitcoin Miners Power Down as Heat Wave Threatens Grid With Rolling Blackouts
entry.summary: The collective move returns over 1% of power in Texas back to retail and commercial users, according to the president of the Texas Blockchain Association.

entry.title: GameStop Opens Ethereum NFT Marketplace Following Company-Wide Layoffs
entry.summary: The long-promised Ethereum NFT platform is live just days after the video game retailer laid off another round of employees.

entry.title: BlockFi CEO Doesn’t Want to Be Compared to Voyager, Celsius
entry.summary: A few days after BlockFi’s warrants were downgraded to “worthless,” Zac Prince took to Twitter to ask that his company not be compared to peers.

entry.title: Three Arrows Capital Office Abandoned, Founders Missing, Say Creditors
entry.summary: 3AC filed for Chapter 15 bankruptcy last month.

entry.title: G20 Watchdog Says 'Robust' Crypto Rules Coming in October
entry.summary: Following news of stiff crypto regulations coming this October, members of the community shared their thoughts with Decrypt.

entry.title: Yam Finance Safeguards $3.1M Treasury From Governance Attack
entry.summary: The Yam Finance team successfully blocked a malicious proposal attempting to rinse the project’s treasury worth $3.1 million.

entry.title: Metaverse Tokens Slump Amid Broader Crypto Market Correction
entry.summary: Metaverse tokens in Decentraland, The Sandbox, Enjin Coin, and Axie Infinity have all tumbled by roughly 6% over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Crypto-Curious Manchester City Adds OKX Logo to New Training Kit
entry.summary: As part of a sponsorship deal signed back in March, the OKX logo will now feature on Manchester City's training gear ahead of the new season.

entry.title: Chelsea Manning Talks Crypto, Privacy, and Security
entry.summary: Chelsea Manning, who gave classified documents regarding the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq to WikiLeaks in 2010, talked to Decrypt's Stacy Elliott about crypto and privacy, decentralization and government, and her work with Nym.

entry.title: Binance CEO CZ on Crypto Bailouts and the Deals He Would Not Do
entry.summary: In an interview for Decrypt's gm podcast, CZ laid out Binance's approach to "bailouts" amid the crypto liquidity crunch, and criticized Alameda's complicated lifeline to Voyager.

entry.title: gm: Senator Cynthia Lummis Is Fighting for Bitcoin
entry.summary: Wyoming Sen. Cynthia Lummis, the "Bitcoin Senator," joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the Lummis-Gillibrand crypto regulation bill, the need for clearer policy on crypto in DC, and converting crypto skeptics—plus her take on the bear market and NFTs. Make sure to subscribe to the podcast.

entry.title: Lolli Bitcoin Shopping App CEO at NFT NYC: NFTs 'Captured the Zeitgeist'
entry.summary: Alex Adelman, CEO of Bitcoin shopping rewards app Lolli, talked to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at NFT NYC about why NFTs have impressed him and why he's "kind of sad" because Bitcoin "should have captured" the cultural moment that Ethereum and NFTs did.

entry.title: NFT NYC: How Dequency Is Using Blockchain to Decentralize Music Usage Rights
entry.summary: Just ahead of a live event during NFT NYC from BeetsDAO and Decrypt, Margaret Link and Keatly Haldeman of Dequency talk to Decrypt EIC Dan Roberts about how their company is using the Algorand blockchain to de-bug the decades-old process of music synchronization rights.

entry.title: The Bill Murray 1,000 NFT Project Reveal Trailer
entry.summary: A first look at actor Bill Murray's upcoming Ethereum NFT project with The Chive and Project Venkman.

entry.title: gm: Meet 'Move to Earn' NFT App Stepn
entry.summary: Stepn is the talk of Crypto Twitter: an app that rewards you in crypto for exercising outdoors. But first you have to buy a pricey sneaker NFT. Stepn CMO Shiti Manghani joined the gm podcast to talk about how the app works, its GST and GMT tokens, Stepn's recent decision regarding China, and why the future for NFTs is utility.

entry.title: NFTs and Knife-Throwing Abound at Superchief Gallery in LA
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin talks to Superchief Gallery co-founder Edward Ed Zipco about NFTs and the potential for digital art at Superchief's 10 anniversary showing in Los Angeles.
